name: Brand Catalyst Media
tag_list: website, design, development, mobile, sites, android, ios, blackberry, applications, cms, erp, crm, seo, social-media, html5
overview:
Brand Catalyst Media is a leading Mumbai(India) based full service web & digital agency. We specialize in high end website design, CMS solutions, web applications, mobile sites, mobile applications(Android, iOS, Blackberry), SEO and Social Media.

Started in August 2005, Brand Catalyst Media comprises of dedicated team of professionals who work to with you on conceptualization, ideation, design, strategy, technology, advertising and marketing. Though that might sound like a handful, we truly believe that it is this mix that makes the perfect recipe for a brilliant project.

Our Core Services include

  • Website Design & Development
  • Web-based Applications including intranets, ERPs, CRMs
  • Content Management Systems
  • iOS, Android and Blackberry Applications
  • xHTML & HTML5 mobile websites
  • Search Engine Optimization
  • Social Media Integration & Connected Social Applications
  • Consultations & Marketing
